Notes.Text:
hostapd was updated to fix following security issue:

- CVE-2018-14526: Ignore unauthenticated encrypted EAPOL-Key data (bsc#1104205)
Notes.Title: Details

Notes.Text: The CVRF data is provided by SUSE under the Creative Commons License 4.0 with Attribution (CC-BY-4.0).
Notes.Title: Terms of Use

Relationships.RelatesToProductReference: SUSE Package Hub for SUSE Linux Enterprise 15

Vulnerabilities.Description: An issue was discovered in rsn_supp/wpa.c in wpa_supplicant 2.0 through 2.6. Under certain conditions, the integrity of EAPOL-Key messages is not checked, leading to a decryption oracle. An attacker within range of the Access Point and client can abuse the vulnerability to recover sensitive information.

ProductID: SUSE Package Hub for SUSE Linux Enterprise 15:hostapd-2.6-bp150.3.3.1
